animeDescription: This episode is a sidestory and can be inserted somewhere between episodes #18 and #21. This is a "mystery" and so the present writer does not tell the whole story. The Janus is sailing towards Taut when something unexpected happens.
animeStaff: [['Ueda Masuo', ['Producer']], ['Yatate Hajime', ['Original Creator']], ['Ookawara Kunio', ['Mechanical Design']], ['Watanabe Toshiyuki', ['Music']]]
